import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import iconheart1 from '../../images/icons/icon-heart-01.png' import iconheart2 from '../../images/icons/icon-heart-02.png' import product1 from '../../images/product-01.jpg' import icon1 from '../../images/icons/icon-heart-01.png' import icon2 from '../../images/icons/icon-heart-02.png' const Product = () => { const [activeFilter, setActiveFilter] = useState('All Product'); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const categories = [ { name: "Electronics", api: "https://fakestoreapi.com/products/category/electronics" }, { name: "All Product", api: "https://fakestoreapi.com/products/category" }, { name: "Jewelery", api: "https://fakestoreapi.com/products/category/jewelery" }, { name: "Men's clothing", api: "https://fakestoreapi.com/products/category/men's clothing" }, { name: "Women's clothing", api: "https://fakestoreapi.com/products/category/women's clothing" }, ]; const handleFilterClick = (filter) => { setActiveFilter(filter); }; useEffect(() => { const fetchProducts = async () => { try { const categoryPromises = categories.map(async (category) => { const response = await fetch(category.api); const data = await response.json(); return { category: category.name, products: data.slice(0, 4), }; }); const results = await Promise.all(categoryPromises); setProducts(results); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching products:', error); } }; fetchProducts(); }, []); // const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); // useEffect(() => { // const fetchProducts = async () => { // try { // const response = await fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products"); // const data = await response.json(); // setProducts(data); // } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching products:", error); } // }; // fetchProducts(); // }, []); return (
